short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Better Salesforce license management and higher safety by automatically (de-)activating users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SF HotSwapper automates Salesforce user management, enhancing security and cutting costs by auto-activating/deactivating users based on login activity 

Through this browser extension and Salesforce API, SF HotSwapper auto-manages user activation, reducing admin workload and optimizing license utilization.

Users can also choose to activate other users if they need to add them to Chatter or as record owners.


Benefits of using SF HotSwapper
- Cost-Efficiency: No need to provide users a full licensed access all the time, especially if they use the system sparingly.
- Automated User Management: Auto-deactivate inactive users and auto-activate them upon login, reducing admin workload.
- Enhanced Security: Ensure only active users have access, enhancing system security.


Auto-Activate Salesforce Users
- Auto-deactivate users that have not logged in for a long time
- Auto-activate users while they are logging into Salesforce
- Safely define which users may be deactivated by adding them to a specific user group
